text: Awesome as Fuck (also stylized as Awesome as F**k or Awesome as ****) is the second live album by American punk rock band, Green Day. Awesome as Fuck was released on March 22, 2011. It has songs from Green Day's 2009â€“2010 21st Century Breakdown World Tour which was in support for their eighth studio album 21st Century Breakdown. It also contains a DVD of a concert that was recorded at the Saitama Super Arena in Saitama, Japan. ==Songs== ==References== Category:2011 albums Category:Green Day albums Category:Punk albums
title: Awesome as Fuck
